2022-10-21

Syra Madad issued a statement on two Biden Administration biodefense plans: National Biodefense Strategy and Implementation Plan and the National Security Memorandum on Countering Biological Threats, Enhancing Pandemic Preparedness, and Achieving Global Health Security.
